actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1979 of the Revised Statutes (42 U.S.C. 1983) to permit suits against bodies politic and the District of Columbia with respect to certain violations of civil rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Revises the provision authorizing suits against persons acting under the color of State or Territorial law for the deprivation of Constitutional and Federal statutory rights to permit suits against (1) bodies politic and (2) persons acting under the color of law of the District of Columbia or a United States possession.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1979 of the Revised Statutes (42 U.S.C. 1983) to permit suits against bodies politic and the District of Columbia with respect to certain violations of civil rights.
